How to install: start setup by using "Ali213-Kane And Lynch 2 Dog Days.exe"...then after u finish the installation chk for "oalinst.exe" in the game folder...install it and then start the game which will bring graphics settings.remove tick box from "ambient occulsion" if you have any problem playing the game....have fun !!
